summary.span: 命名空间提供类，用于缓存服务器上经常使用的数据。

span.span: The namespace provides classes for caching frequently used data on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间包括 类，这是一个可用于存储哈希表和数据集等数据对象的字典。This namespace includes the class, a dictionary that enables you to store data objects such as hash tables and data sets. 它还提供了这些对象的过期功能，以及使您能够添加和删除对象的方法。It also provides expiration functionality for those objects, and methods that enable you to add and remove the objects. 您可以将对象添加到缓存中，并依赖于其他文件或缓存条目。You can add the objects to the cache with a dependency on other files or cache entries. 在这种情况下， 对象可以调用回调方法，以便在从缓存中删除对象时通知应用程序。In that case, the object can invoke a callback method to notify your application when an object is removed from the cache.
